item.title: Minimize the blast radius of your applications
item.description: Code sample published in aws-samples/shuffle-sharding-demo-app . In this session, you will learn how to apply the Reliability Pillar from the AWS Well-Architected Framework to your workloads. We will dive into modern architectural techniques and best practices like shuffle sharding and cell-based architecture. We will provide practical implementations with a short demo and reference architecture diagrams.
